name: Negative Calorie Foods
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
benefits: Preloading with negative calorie foods (raw vegetables or fruits) before meals significantly reduces overall caloric intake. The high water and fiber content increases satiety while providing minimal calories. Eating these first helps crowd out more calorie-dense foods.
amount: Preload with raw vegetables or fruit before each meal

quotes: PRELOAD WITH 'NEGATIVE CALORIE' FOODS - Start each meal with an apple, light salad, or a soup (broth-based or pur√©ed vegetables, but not a cream soup).
